item.description:
Hi, everyone,

Join us for a weekly, drop-in Swing group class on Wednesdays beginning in December.  We will cover a variety of swing styles in this class...Jitterbug, Jive, Lindy, West Coast and more! 

No experience required. Fun, casual atmosphere.  

Wednesday nights @ 7:30pm, beginning on Dec 7. 

The group class is 45 minutes.
Cost is $10 per person.

We are located at 33 Winn Street. From 128, take the Winn Street exit #34. Follow signs toward Woburn. The studio is in a white building on the corner of Winn Street and Mountain Road (across from Dunkin Donuts). Parking and entrance are in the rear of the building. Go in the glass door on the left, and up the stairs to the 2nd floor.

Feel free to call the studio with questions, and I hope to see you there!

-Kelley

Kadanse
781-27-DANCE (273-2623)
info@kadanse.com
www.kadanse.com

group.name: The North Shore Ballroom Dancing Meetup Group

item.name: Swing dance group class!
